item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:-39 Chances: Analysts believe that Plug Power has enormous potential if it can get its costs under control. Wall Street loves a good comeback story and often puts elevated price targets on severely beaten-down stocks, indicating a potential rebound. The clean energy industry is showing promise, and Plug Power is positioned to benefit from the shift towards alternative energy technology.
